projects.name: Job.af - Job Board App
projects.description: A job board app for job seekers. It is a mobile application that allows users to search for jobs, apply for jobs, and view job details.

projects.name: Baran - Reading App
projects.description: It offers children the ability to read books, listen to audio books, and explore engaging book details, all within a fun and subscription-based platform tailored for young readers.

projects.name: Weena.af - Blood Donation App
projects.description: The platform enables users to donate blood, search for blood donors, and access detailed blood information. Users can also explore a donor map, search for donors nearby, and create personalized donor profiles for seamless connections.

projects.name: Wagey - Food Ordering App
projects.description: A restaurant-based app that allows users to order food, explore detailed menus, and track their orders, offering a seamless dining experience.

projects.name: Daricha - Educational App
projects.description: An educational app sponsored by the European Union, designed to help users learn, explore courses, and access course detailsâ€”spreading awareness about people's rights and promoting informed citizenship.
